name: Bulbasaur
dex_entry:
A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant
             sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

name: Ivysaur
dex_entry:
When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the
             speed to stand on its hind legs.

name: Venusaur
dex_entry:
The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on
             the move to seek sunlight.

name: Charmander
dex_entry:
Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to
             spout from the tip of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
dex_entry:
When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to
             unbearably high levels.

name: Charizard
dex_entry:
Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause
             forest fires unintentionally.

name: Squirtle
dex_entry:
After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell.
             Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

name: Wartortle
dex_entry:
Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it
             moves its ears to maintain balance.

name: Blastoise
dex_entry:
A brutal Pokémon with pressurized water jets on its shell. They
             are used for high speed tackles.

name: Caterpie
dex_entry:
Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to
              tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

name: Metapod
dex_entry:
This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft,
              exposing its weak and tender body.

name: Butterfree
dex_entry:
In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly
              toxic dust into the air.

name: Weedle
dex_entry:
Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous
              stinger on its head.

name: Kakuna
dex_entry:
Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its
              shell to protect itself from predators.

name: Beedrill
dex_entry:
Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous
              stingers on its forelegs and tail.

name: Pidgey
dex_entry:
A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at
              ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: Pidgeotto
dex_entry:
Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this Pokémon
              will fiercely peck at any intruder.

name: Pidgeot
dex_entry:
When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to
              pick off unwary prey such as Magikarp.

name: Rattata
dex_entry:
Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a
              common sight in many places.

name: Raticate
dex_entry:
It uses its whiskers to maintain balance. It apparently slows
              down if they are cut off.

name: Spearow
dex_entry:
Eats bugs in grassy area. It has to flap its short wings at
              high speed to stay airborne.

name: Fearow
dex_entry:
With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without
              ever having to land for rest.

name: Ekans
dex_entry:
Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as
              Pidgey and Spearow, whole.

name: Arbok
dex_entry:
It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly
              differ from area to area.

name: Pikachu
dex_entry:
When several of these Pokémon gather, their electricity could
              build and cause lightning storms.

name: Raichu
dex_entry:
Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own
              high voltage power.

name: Sandshrew
dex_entry:
Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It
              only emerges to hunt for food.

name: Sandslash
dex_entry:
Curls up into a ball when threatened. It can roll while curled
              up to attack or escape.

name: Nidoran♀
dex_entry:
Although small, its venomous barbs render this Pokémon
              dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

name: Nidorina
dex_entry:
The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks
              such as clawing and biting.

name: Nidoqueen
dex_entry:
Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty
              bulk to execute powerful moves.

name: Nidoran♂
dex_entry:
Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the
              more powerful its secreted venom.

name: Nidorino
dex_entry:
An aggressive Pokémon that is quick to attack. The horn on its
              head secretes a powerful venom.

name: Nidoking
dex_entry:
It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then
              break the prey's bones.

name: Clefairy
found_in: near Celadon City, Mt. Moon and Cerulean City.
dex_entry:
Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and
              found only in certain areas.

name: Clefable
dex_entry:
A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen. It will run and hide
              the moment it senses people.

name: Vulpix
dex_entry:
At the time of its birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits
              from its tip as it grows older.

name: Ninetales
dex_entry:
Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails
              could result in a 1000-year curse.

name: Jigglypuff
dex_entry:
When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing
              melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

name: Wigglytuff
dex_entry:
The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air
              and inflate itself to an enormous size.

name: Zubat
dex_entry:
Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic
              waves to identify and approach targets.

name: Golbat
dex_entry:
Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the
              victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

name: Oddish
dex_entry:
During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At
              night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

name: Gloom
dex_entry:
The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar
              that is used to attract prey.

name: Vileplume
dex_entry:
The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its
              big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

name: Paras
found_in: Mt. Moon, Safari Zone & Seafoam Island
dex_entry:
Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by
              drawing nutrients from the bug host.

name: Parasect
dex_entry:
A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken
              over the host bug. Prefers damp places.

name: Venonat
dex_entry:
Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is
              attracted by light at night.

name: Venomoth
found_in: Safari Zone, Victory Road & Unknown Dungeon
dex_entry:
The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to
              indicate the kinds of poison it has.

name: Diglett
dex_entry:
Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots.
              It sometimes appears above ground.

name: Dugtrio
dex_entry:
A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by
              burrowing 60 miles underground.

name: Meowth
dex_entry:
Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis
              to look for dropped loose change.

name: Persian
dex_entry:
Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a
              pet because of its fickle meanness.

name: Psyduck
dex_entry:
While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily
              Pokémon will use psychokinetic powers.

name: Golduck
dex_entry:
Often seen swimming elegantly by lake shores. It is often
              mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

name: Mankey
dex_entry:
Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then
              thrashing away the next instant.

name: Primeape
dex_entry:
Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon
              chasing its quarry until it is caught.

name: Growlithe
dex_entry:
Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to
              repel intruders from its space.

name: Arcanine
dex_entry:
A Pokémon that has been admired since the past for its beauty.
              It runs agilely as if on wings.

name: Poliwag
dex_entry:
Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to
              prefer swimming than trying to stand.

name: Poliwhirl
dex_entry:
Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it
              sweats to keep its body slimy.

name: Poliwrath
dex_entry:
An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke.
              Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

name: Abra
dex_entry:
Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending
              danger and teleport to safety.

name: Kadabra
dex_entry:
It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce
              headaches just by being close by.

name: Alakazam
dex_entry:
Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its intelligence
              quotient is said to be 5,000.

name: Machop
dex_entry:
Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial
              arts to become even stronger.

name: Machoke
dex_entry:
Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save
              belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: Machamp
dex_entry:
Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can
              send the victim clear over the horizon.

name: Bellsprout
dex_entry:
A carnivorous Pokémon that traps and eats bugs. It uses its
              root feet to soak up needed moisture.

name: Weepinbell
dex_entry:
It spits out Poison Powder to immobilize the enemy and then
              finishes it with a spray of Acid.

name: Victreebel
dex_entry:
Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one
              has ever returned from there.

name: Tentacool
found_in: Pallet Town, Viridian City, Route 12-13, Route 19-20
dex_entry:
Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are
              often punished by its stinging acid.

name: Tentacruel
dex_entry:
The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are
              extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

name: Geodude
found_in: Mt. Moon, Rock Tunnel & Victory Road
dex_entry:
Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders,
              people often step or trip on them.

name: Graveler
dex_entry:
Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without
              slowing or changing its direction.

name: Golem
dex_entry:
Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily
              withstand dynamite blasts without damage.

name: Ponyta
dex_entry:
Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample
              anything completely flat in little time.

name: Rapidash
dex_entry:
Very competitive, this Pokémon will chase anything that moves
              fast in the hopes of racing it.

name: Slowpoke
dex_entry:
Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel
              pain when under attack.

name: Slowbro
dex_entry:
The Shellder that is latched onto Slowpoke's tail is said to
              feed on the host's left over scraps.

name: Magnemite
dex_entry:
Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning
              and uses Thunder Wave and similar moves.

name: Magneton
dex_entry:
Formed by several Magnemites linked together. They frequently
              appear when sunspots flare up.

name: Farfetch'd
dex_entry:
The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used
              much like a metal sword.

name: Doduo
dex_entry:
A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot
              speed. Leaves giant footprints.

name: Dodrio
dex_entry:
Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads
              sleep, one head stays awake.

name: Seel
dex_entry:
The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for
              bashing through thick ice.

name: Dewgong
dex_entry:
Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots
              even in intensely cold waters.

name: Grimer
dex_entry:
Appears in filthy areas, Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge
              that is pumped out of factories.

name: Muk
dex_entry:
Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic,
              even its footprints contain poison.

name: Shellder
dex_entry:
Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only
              when its shell is open.

name: Cloyster
dex_entry:
When attacked, it launches horns in quick volleys. Its innards
              have never been seen.

name: Gastly
dex_entry:
Almost invisible, this gaseous Pokémon cloaks the target and
              puts it to sleep without notice.

name: Haunter
dex_entry:
Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said
              to be from another dimension.

name: Gengar
dex_entry:
Under a full moon, this Pokémon likes to mimic the shadows of
              people and laugh at their fright.

name: Onix
dex_entry:
As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become
              similar to a diamond, but colored black.

name: Drowzee
dex_entry:
Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets
              sick from eating bad dreams.

name: Hypno
dex_entry:
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI
              moves such as Hypnosis and Confusion.

name: Krabby
dex_entry:
Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for
              balance when walking sideways.

name: Kingler
dex_entry:
The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its
              huge size makes it unwieldy to use.

name: Voltorb
dex_entry:
Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a Poké
               Ball, they have zapped many people.

name: Electrode
found_in: Power Plant, Cinnabar Island, Unknown Dungeon
dex_entry:
It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often
               explodes with little or no provocation.

name: Exeggcute
dex_entry:
Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather
               and attack in swarms.

name: Exeggutor
dex_entry:
Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will
               drop off and continue on as an Exeggcute.

name: Cubone
dex_entry:
Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has even
               seen this Pokémon's real face.

name: Marowak
dex_entry:
The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone
               skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

name: Hitmonlee
dex_entry:
When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs
               smoothly with extra long, loping strides.

name: Hitmonchan
dex_entry:
While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning
               fast volleys that are impossible to see.

name: Lickitung
dex_entry:
Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a
               tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

name: Koffing
dex_entry:
Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in it body, it
               is prone to explode without warning.

name: Weezing
dex_entry:
Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 Koffings can fuse into
               a Weezing over many years.

name: Rhyhorn
dex_entry:
Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It
               can easily knock a trailer flying.

name: Rhydon
dex_entry:
Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in
               molten lava of 3,600 degrees.

name: Chansey
dex_entry:
A rare and elusive Pokémon that is said to bring happiness to
               those who manage to get it.

name: Tangela
dex_entry:
The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to
               seaweed. Its vines shake as it walks.

name: Kangaskhan
dex_entry:
The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective
               pouch until it is 3 years old.

name: Horsea
dex_entry:
Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink
               from the surface of the water.

name: Seadra
dex_entry:
Capable of swimming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-
               like pectoral fins and stout tail.

name: Goldeen
dex_entry:
Its tail fin billow like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it
               the nickname of the Water Queen.

name: Seaking
dex_entry:
In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming
               powerfully up rivers and creeks.

name: Staryu
dex_entry:
An enigmatic Pokémon that can effortlessly regenerate any
               appendage it loses in battle.

name: Starmie
dex_entry:
Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow.
               Some value the core as a gem.

name: Mr. Mime
dex_entry:
If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the
               offender with its broad hands.

name: Scyther
dex_entry:
With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion
               that there is more than one.

name: Jynx
dex_entry:
It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause
               people to dance in unison with it.

name: Electabuzz
dex_entry:
Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and
               cause major blackouts in cities.

name: Magmar
dex_entry:
Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to
               hide perfectly among flames.

name: Pinsir
dex_entry:
If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing
               it around and toss it hard.

name: Tauros
dex_entry:
When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping
               its body with its long tails.

name: Magikarp
dex_entry:
In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the
               horribly weak descendants that exist today.

name: Gyarados
dex_entry:
Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of
               destroying entire cities in a rage.

name: Lapras
dex_entry:
A Pokémon that has been overhunted almost to extinction. It
               can ferry people across the water.

name: Ditto
found_in: Route 13, Route 14, Route 15, Route 23, Unknown Dungeon
dex_entry:
Capable of copying an enemy's genetic code to instantly
               transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.

name: Eevee
dex_entry:
Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed
               to radiation from element Stones.

name: Vaporeon
dex_entry:
Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which
               is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

name: Jolteon
dex_entry:
It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out
               10,000-volt lightning bolts.

name: Flareon
dex_entry:
When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could
               soar to over 1,600 degrees.

name: Porygon
dex_entry:
A Pokémon that consists entirely of programming code. Capable
               of moving freely in cyberspace.

name: Omanyte
dex_entry:
Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically
               resurrected from fossils.

name: Omastar
dex_entry:
A prehistoric Pokémon that died out when its heavy shell made
               it impossible to catch prey.

name: Kabuto
dex_entry:
A Pokémon that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was
               once the ocean floor eons ago.

name: Kabutops
dex_entry:
Its sleek shape is perfect for swimming. It slashes prey with
               its claws and drains the body fluids.

name: Aerodactyl
dex_entry:
A ferocious, prehistoric Pokémon that goes for the enemy's
               throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.

name: Snorlax
dex_entry:
Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it
               becomes steadily more slothful.

name: Articuno
dex_entry:
A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear to doomed
               people who are lost in icy mountains.

name: Zapdos
dex_entry:
A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear from clouds
               while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

name: Moltres
dex_entry:
Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings
               creates a dazzling flash of flames.

name: Dratini
dex_entry:
Long considered a mythical Pokémon until recently when a small
               colony was found living underwater.

name: Dragonair
dex_entry:
A mystical Pokémon that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability
               to change climate conditions.

name: Dragonite
dex_entry:
An extremely rarely seen marine Pokémon. Its intelligence is
               said to match that of humans.

name: Mewtwo
dex_entry:
It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene
               splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

name: Mew
dex_entry:
So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts.
               Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
